sn56.129-130:3.1: 129–​130 Dying as Ghosts and Reborn as Gods
sn56.129-130:4.1: “… the sentient beings who die as ghosts and are reborn as gods are few,
sn56.129-130:4.2: while those who die as ghosts and are reborn in hell are many.”
sn56.129-130:4.3: “… the sentient beings who die as ghosts and are reborn as gods are few,
sn56.129-130:4.4: while those who die as ghosts and are reborn in the animal realm are many.”
